description: image of two oil barrels suspended amid a jumble of hoses and branches printed in the LR portion of paper in navy blue ink; vertical and horizontal linear forms printed over the top with salmon colored ink; cobalt blue and white brush strokes over top; white space to L
marks: Signature, Date in pencil LL corner [Rauschenberg 90]
medium: Acrylic paint and screenprint on paper
title: Barrel Up
